author: Ryan Daws
description:
Factory’s new ‘Droids’ aren’t typical AI coding assistants, they’re billed as full-blown software development agents. Instead of just focusing on code completion or simple generation tasks, Factory claims to have built AI agents that can handle the often messy reality of the entire development lifecycle. Maybe Factory’s AI agents are the droids you’re looking for... Read more »

The post Factory ‘Droids’ AI agents tackle entire development lifecycle appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Factory ‘Droids’ AI agents tackle entire development lifecycle
